summary: Application that let users manage custom music files using MediaMonkey and the Personalized Music Mod created by No_Aardvarks_Allowed
descriptionHtml:
[Size=16][b]Skyrim Musci Manager[/b][/Size]

-----------------------------------------------------
[list=1]
[*]Introduction
[*]Requisitions
[*]How to Use
[*]Notes
[*]Changelog
[/list]

-----------------------------------------------------

[b]Introduction[/b]

SkyrimMusicManager is an application that make it easy for users select and convert musics to be used in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13286/?]Personalized Music by No_Aardvarks_Allowed[/url]

[b]Requisitions[/b]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13286/?]Personalized Music by No_Aardvarks_Allowed[/url]
-MediaMonkey - [color=#CC0000]*Not the portable edition*[/color]
- .NET 4.5

[b]How to Use[/b]

1- Open Media Monkey
2- Open SMM
3- In the tab settings set the path to your music folder in skyrim (%SKYRIM FOLDER%\DATA\MUSIC)
4- Restart SMM
5- Now in the Media Monkey you will see a playlist with the name 'SkyrimMusicManager', inside it will have multiple playlists, each one with correspondent category as name. add the musics that you want to each one.
6- In SMM press Update ALL playlist
7- wait for process to complete (Program could become unresponsive)
8- Start Skyrim.

[b]Notes[/b]

- Only MP3 is supported
- Make sure that you have enough space
- Make sure that the skyrim folder have write authorization

[b]Changelog[/b] 

- ALPHA2 - Inicial public release
author: David Pires
